item.title: First
item.description: I have always been afraid of writing. I always regard authors with high respect. The articles or books they write are well researched and thought out and the writing flows as a conversation into the readerâ€™s mind. My writing does not match, unfortunately, any of the qualities mentioned above. Nevertheless, I plan to start writing not as a way to impart wisdom, but to document my imperfections and work on it.
